page.title: 19INKBERROW IN 2085.
page.content: In Inkberrow in{2085},a hundred years from now I think there might be a sports centre with squash courts and a swimming pool.Robot cars that go 204 m.p.h. at the slowest,and 408m.p.h. at the fastest.There might be a helicopter landing pad and a better way of heating houses.I think there might be flyovers to lessen accidents.We might just have a cathedral.There might be cars that go anywhere by themselves and perhaps automatic lawnmowers that cut the grass when it gets too long. In 100 years time I hope there will be no more wars.I hope there will be a drug to make us live longer and I hope people will enjoy themselves
